item.title: Week 1
item.description:
Guiding Questions

This week, we set out to answer two key questions about presidential elections in the United States.

  1. How competitive are presidential elections in the United States?
  2. Which states vote blue/red and how consistently? There are many ways to approach these questions, especially with predictive ends in mind. Is it possible to gather enough data points about a state to accurately understand the likelihood of its individual outcome in the upcoming election?

Analysis & Visualization
